ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)
ygData.msgSnippet: By Magical Benefits I assume the writer is referring to the Dirk s +2 Dex and +3 Magic Resistance benefits. Tim ... From: Bob Stewart
ygData.messageBody:
By "Magical Benefits" I assume the writer is referring to the Dirk's +2 Dex
and +3 Magic Resistance benefits.

Tim

-----Original Message-----
From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, June 17, 1999 7:35 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)


>From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>
>
>At 06:08 PM 6/16/99 -0700, Dan Bouchard wrote:
>> The Dragoon Dirk can be equipped in your ranged weapon slot. This is
>>good if you don't use Piercing but still want to reap the magical benefits
>>of the Dirk. We can't use ranged weapons, so we might as well make some
use
>>of that slot.
>
>In that position does it make your other attacks magical?
>
>We can use thrown weapons. I have batch of throwing knives I use to start
>fights, although I'll probably stop carrying them now that I have Bellow.
>
> Thrush
>
